title: How do you beat the All Blacks? By problem solving faster than they do
text:
The key to beating the All Blacks at a World Cup is not about how strong or quick you are, or how innovative your tactical playbook might be. Instead, in my experience, it comes down to whether you can problem solve faster than they can.

The thing with playing New Zealand is that you don’t have to beat them just once during 80 minutes. Instead you have to defeat their Plan A and then, just as quickly, come up with something that prevents Plan B or C overwhelming you.
